backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no exposed methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Valentine UI requirements to relevant frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human-written summaries describing key frontend files and their purposes in the Valentine UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color variables and theming for the project.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI with Yes/No prompt, evasive No button logic, and meme reveal on Yes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to user identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider handling Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder hook since no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with a pink-themed palette, fonts, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry file wiring providers and rendering the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration that sets dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, fonts, animations, and includes typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a romantic Valentine web page, its features, required images, and pending feature requests.
